articles.author: FP Explainers
articles.title: What is APEC and why was India’s membership bid rejected? - Firstpost
articles.description: A summit of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation APEC is underway in San Francisco. Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal is attending the gathering though India is not a member of the group. Its attempt to join the bloc in  was turned down. Heres why
articles.content: In the world of diplomacy, the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) is creating a lot of buzz. A meeting of the grouping in San Francisco began on 11 November with the Leaders Week and will concl… [+5881 chars]
